Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A large group of about twenty male and female dancers occupy the space, their garments crafted of fine materials in a veritable rainbow of hues. When the couples are not dancing, they are mingling around the perimeter in small groups. The constant flutter of finely-embroidered fans create a soft susurration accented by the rustle of the silk skirts, while the men gesture with sleek canes or silk handkerchiefs as they move.

A large group of about twenty male and female dancers occupy the space, their garments crafted of fine materials in a veritable rainbow of hues. When the couples are not dancing, they are mingling around the perimeter in small groups. The constant flutter of finely-embroidered fans create a soft susurration accented by the rustle of the silk skirts, while the men gesture with sleek canes or silk handkerchiefs as they move.
one of the men in the group of dancers

The men of the group are sharply-dressed in fine materials with dapper accessories like canes, top hats and handkerchiefs. When they are not coupled off on the dance floor, they mingle in groups to the side, boisterously laughing and toasting one another.
one of the women in the group of dancers

The women are finely dressed in silk gowns, accessorized with embroidered fans and formal gloves. The dresses are in a rainbow of hues, glittering with jewelry and decoration. When they are not coupled on the dance floor, they chatter in small groups, laughing merrily as they whisper behind their fans.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[M] EmitTo(\$actor, "You cannot take " + Describe(\$this)+ " because it is not yours."); return FALSE;
